attributes.action: Force contracts for Building Service Charges to go up for bid every three years.
attributes.additional_details: Services are famously poor and charges rising out-of-control and accountability is weak and expensive to pursue as a customer.
attributes.background:
Government needs to stop the scam that is the buildings service charges on flats and multi-dwelling buildings.

The fix is easy.

All buildings services contracts should go up for a renewal bidding periodically. Three-yearly would be appropriate.

Only permit increases within inflation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Cap all property management fees and service charges: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700308
